Uses of Interface
com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.asyncqueue.AsyncEventQueueFactory

  • Packages that use AsyncEventQueueFactory 
    Package Description
    com.gemstone.gemfire.cache
    Provides an implementation of distributed object caching that can leverage GemFire's distribution capabilities.
    com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.asyncqueue  

    • Uses of AsyncEventQueueFactory in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache

      Methods in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache that return AsyncEventQueueFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsyncEventQueueFactory Cache.createAsyncEventQueueFactory()
      Creates AsyncEventQueueFactory for creating a AsyncEventQueue

    • Uses of AsyncEventQueueFactory in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.asyncqueue

      Methods in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.asyncqueue that return AsyncEventQueueFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.addGatewayEventFilter(GatewayEventFilter filter)
      Removes a GatewayEventFilter to the attributes of AsyncEventQueue being created by factory.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.removeGatewayEventFilter(GatewayEventFilter filter)
      Removes the provided GatewayEventFilter from the attributes of AsyncEventQueue being created by factory.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setBatchConflationEnabled(boolean isConflation)
      Sets whether to enable batch conflation for AsyncEventQueue.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setBatchSize(int size)
      Sets the batch size for an AsyncEventQueue's queue.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setBatchTimeInterval(int interval)
      Sets the batch time interval (in milliseconds) for a AsyncEventQueue.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setDiskStoreName(String name)
      Sets the disk store name for overflow or persistence.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setDiskSynchronous(boolean isSynchronous)
      Sets whether or not the writing to the disk is synchronous.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setDispatcherThreads(int numThreads)
      Sets the number of dispatcher thread.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setGatewayEventSubstitutionListener(GatewayEventSubstitutionFilter filter)
      Sets the GatewayEventSubstitutionFilter.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setMaximumQueueMemory(int memory)
      Sets the maximum amount of memory (in MB) for an AsyncEventQueue's queue.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setOrderPolicy(Gateway.OrderPolicy policy)
      Sets the order policy for multiple dispatchers.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setParallel(boolean isParallel)
      Indicates whether all VMs need to distribute events to remote site.
      AsyncEventQueueFactory AsyncEventQueueFactory.setPersistent(boolean isPersistent)
      Sets whether the AsyncEventQueue is persistent or not.
